channel.title: Kicksecure Landing page developent
channel.description:
Kicksecure will require a landing / Welcome page created prior to a call for testers. I'll be working on this as an addition to my GSoD project. ([https://forum.whonix.org/t/document-installation-and-setup-of-the-new-security-focused-hardened-debian-linux-distribution-selected-by-whonix-for-season-of-docs-2019/7887](https://forum.whonix.org/t/document-installation-and-setup-of-the-new-security-focused-hardened-debian-linux-distribution-selected-by-whonix-for-season-of-docs-2019/7887))
Related:
https://github.com/Whonix/whonix-welcome-page
https://forums.whonix.org/t/secbrowser-welcome-page/7635

item.title: Kicksecure Landing page developent
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Kicksecure is currently using SecBrowser welcome page. Good enough for early versions of Kicksecure.This could be considered low priority in case there are other issues.

item.title: Kicksecure Landing page developent
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Kicksecure will require a landing / Welcome page created prior to a call for testers. I’ll be working on this as an addition to my GSoD project. (https://forum.whonix.org/t/document-installation-and-setup-of-the-new-security-focused-hardened-debian-linux-distribution-selected-by-whonix-for-season-of-docs-2019/7887)

Related:

GitHub

Whonix/whonix-welcome-page

Whonix Welcome Page is the local homepage for Tor Browser in Whonix - Whonix/whonix-welcome-page

SecBrowser Welcome Page Development
Made a little progress on the SecBrowser landing page. For now focusing on formatting. Using https://www.torproject.org/ for inspiration. Since this is a browser landing page the content should be cut down to only the important stuff. Just the main points with a link to more detailed info. What can be removed? To spice things up a bit a clickable button can be added for the Donate link and more visually appealing fonts/color scheme. For the title I’ll try and create an icon if Gimp starts coop…

Read full topic
